description:
To kick off the new season, Keroro tries to take over the Hinata household again!  Sadly for him, it goes much as before, as Aki is still far more intimidating than he is.  Then Momoka has yet another plan to get Fuyuki closer to her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De retour sur Terre / Tamama et Tamama sombre
Keroro Futatabi Daichi ni Tatsu! de Arimasu / Tamama Kuroi Tamama de Arimasu
ケロロ 再び大地に立つ! であります / タママ 黒いタママ であります
